name: places/ChIJG837XVhYwokRESq1k2fVy4M
formattedAddress: 338 W 57th St, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 338 W 57th St, New York, NY 10019-3700, USA

editorialSummary.text: Pet store carrying heath-conscious food & supplements, plus toys, shampoos & other supplies.

originalText.text: It’s time to go to Amazon.  When the prices are twice as much as Amazon or Chewy and the store just shuts down with no notice so you cannot get your dogs’ food, it’s time to go.  I have been a customer here for the last eight years (at least) and have spent the ridiculous prices to be loyal to the store in my neighborhood and because Katherine is amazing.  However Pet Market just does not have any loyalty.  They closed the store on a Sunday without notice so my dogs ran out of food and I tried calling and despite the fact that they have another store, they refused to deliver the food or provide any other option.  I will not support this business and pay the exorbitant prices for my two dogs when it means they close the store without any notice and I do not have a backup.  I tried…. but I am switching to Amazon. (Also their new loyalty program is terrible-do not bother!)

originalText.text: Wonderful staff in a pet shop stacked with almost everything you are looking for and need for your pet. A treasure in the neighborhood.

text.text: Wonderful staff in a pet shop stacked with almost everything you are looking for and need for your pet. A treasure in the neighborhood.

originalText.text: I see some people are saying the prices are overpriced; however, it’s in a busy neighborhood, I think it’s expected for a small independent pet store. You most certainly go to one of the pet store that are mainstream, but you’ll have to go out of your way to find it. In the middle of shops and restaurants in the area, it’s nice to have a neighborhood pet store. I’ve been here a few times and I find it convenient. The people working there have always been welcoming and that’s why I keep going. One time I ran out of Vital dog food and they were able to get it for me the same day. It’s customer service and convenience for me that’s won me over.

originalText.text: This is our go-to shop in our HK neighborhood. They have made Apollo feel like he is part of the store since he was a little pup and we often just take a walk to the store to pick up little treat so he can say hello

text.text: This is our go-to shop in our HK neighborhood. They have made Apollo feel like he is part of the store since he was a little pup and we often just take a walk to the store to pick up little treat so he can say hello

originalText.text: Have to write a review about this place because of the nice, I believe Irish lady who works there. I went in to look for a coat for the pit bull of a homeless woman on a freezing day and her and her dog were both out in the cold on the sidewalk. I went to this store and this kind lady came to help me while I explained the situation. Before o knew it, she found a beautiful sweater for the dog and gave it to me for FREE. Her kindness and generosity won’t soon be forgetting and very much appreciated! Thank you!
